mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT R.RESERVATION_ID, M.NICK, R.CHECK_IN_DATE, R.CHECK_OUT_DATE, S.ROOM_NAME, S.STORE_NAME FROM RESERVATION R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.NO JOIN STAY S ON R.STAY_NO = S.NO JOIN BUSINESS_MEMBER B ON B.NO = S.BUSINESS_MEMBER_NO WHERE B.NO = #{no, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )T ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
SELECT COUNT(RESERVATION_ID) FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_STATUS = 1
